sense.def:
Z izrazom
least
povemo, da je količina nečesa tako majhna, kolikor je mogoče.

seg.quote: ...the thinner animals, who had the least muscle over their bones.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
least
tudi povemo, da je nekaj res v tako majhni meri ali stopnji, kot je le mogoče.

seg.quote: He came out when I least expected it.
They're the ones who need it the least.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
least
tudi povemo, da ima nekaj manj določene lastnosti kot večina stvari iste vrste.

seg.quote: ...one of the smallest and least powerful of the African states.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
least
tudi poudarimo, da je določena stvar ali okoliščina veliko manj pomembna ali resna kot druge.

seg.quote: That was the least of her worries.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at least
povemo, da je omenjeno število ali količina najmanjša verjetna, resnično število ali količina pa je morda večja.

seg.quote: He drank at least half a bottle of whisky a day.
I must have slept twelve hours at least.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at least
tudi povemo, da je nekaj najmanj, kar bi morali storiti, čeprav v resnici mislimo, da bi moralo biti storjeno več.

seg.quote: Go to see the administrator or at least write a letter.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at least
tudi nakažemo prednost, ki obstaja kljub pravkar omenjenemu neugodnemu ali slabemu položaju.

seg.quote: The process looks rather laborious but at least it is not dangerous.

sense.def:
Izraz
at least
lahko uporabimo, kadar želimo popraviti nekaj, kar smo pravkar rekli.

seg.quote: A couple of days ago I spotted my ex-wife; at least I thought I did, I wasn't sure.

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
in the least
in
the least bit
poudarimo zanikanje.

cit.quote: niti najmanj, sploh ne, nikakor ne

seg.quote: I don't mind in the least, I really don't.
She wasn't the least bit jealous.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
to say the least
namignemo, da so določene okoliščine v resnici veliko skrajnejše ali resnejše, kot trdimo.

seg.quote: ...a development which will have, to say the least, intriguing effects.

sense.def:
Izraz
not least
uporabimo, kadar navajamo pomemben primer ali vzrok.

seg.quote: ...all western countries, not least the USA.

sense.def:
Izraz
least of all
lahko uprabimo za zanikano trditvijo in tako poudarimo, da označuje določeno osebo ali stvar.

seg.quote: Nobody seemed amused, least of all Jenny.
